info.game_comments:
Chuck Forrest game 5.
Chuck sets a new total cash winnings record of $72,800.
A very brief clip of this game was seen in the 2019-04-10 episode of The Goldbergs.

(2, 1).clue: She accepted her Oscar for Best Actress shouting, "You like me! You like me!"

(4, 1).clue: Most living organisms have millions, but a prisoner only has one

(5, 1).clue: You can get a knish at a Jewish one, or mozzarella at an Italian one

(2, 2).correct response: it\'s the life in my men
